page_description: IntroductionIn order to support our Illinois Tech Coursera students, our Coursera program advisers will provide guidance as you progress through the program

advisers.title: M.B.A. Program Adviser
advisers.name: Yumiko Saito
bio: Yumiko Saito joined the Illinois Tech community as an academic adviser in September 2024. She provides academic advising support primarily to the Coursera M.B.A. students. She holds a B.A. in psychology and an M.A. in counseling from the University of Arizona. She has a strong background in behavioral health and worked as a mental health therapist with a diverse range of clients, which enriches her ability to provide holistic support to students from diverse backgrounds. She also has experience as an academic adviser for undergraduate students prior to joining Illinois Tech. In addition, Yumiko’s personal journey as an international student herself allows her to become a better advocate for students from various backgrounds and enhance their experience at Illinois Tech.

advisers.title: College of Computing Program Manager and Adviser
advisers.name: Dennis King
bio: Dennis brings nearly 20 years of experience in student support, supplemental instruction, program development, management and supervision in public higher education. In addition to his student success leadership and administrative responsibilities, his journey as a practitioner in higher education is steeped in promoting academic excellence and ensuring equitable educational opportunities. As the adviser for College of Computing programs (Bachelor of IT, Master of IT, and Master of Data Science), Dennis will work to ensure that all CoC learners are provided quality advising services as they journey to reach their academic, personal, and professional goals.
